item.title: ROS Serial on Arduino
item.description: Pi with Arduino Let us see how we could set up the ROS serial communication between a Raspberry Pi and an Arduino board. So, our very first integration attempt is to integrate the Raspberry Pi with Arduino. We will use the Raspberry Pi 4. Let us break this down into the following steps: ROS on the Raspberry Pi 4 Serial libraries on the Pi and Arduino Raspberry Pi 4 Setup It is pretty easy to get your hands on the Pi, so just go grab one and follow along.
